welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sabie, a charming town nestled in the scenic Mpumalanga province of South Africa! Known for its breathtaking waterfalls and outdoor adventures, we invite you to explore and soak in the beauty of our beloved city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sabi Sabi Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sabi Sabi Airport caters to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kruger Mpumalanga International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Kruger Mpumalanga International Airport, serving flights within South Africa.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nelspruit Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
